textBox.richText: Euro 2012: It was fun as long as it lasted.

It started so nice and then it ended so bad... well maybe not bad, but at least they could have advanced to the quarters. Well; judging from the Match against both Portugal and Germany it was probably the two best teams who made it to the quarter finals from our group - it would have been fun with DK in the quarters though. But the Germans are happy... but come on - what’s up with all the honking after each match. It’s okay you go crazy when/if you win the tournament, but after every God damn match - come on! Besides watching football I have started reading up for the defense - 2 weeks left and counting. I must admit it has actually been good to brush up all the basic astrophysics stuff; it’s like much of it makes much more sense now that I have been doing this for 4 years without worrying about the next exam and just focused on the research. But I must also admit that it’s not all of the things I brush up which are equally interesting - no offense but sunspots, asteroid chemical composition, and planet formation is not really my thing... But the preparation is moving forward which is good. Friday I went out for some beers to focus on something else (or more correctly focus on nothing really) with a couple of the guys from basket. We ended up going all in which was really what I needed. Wasn’t that productive yesterday but I’m pretty sure that the stress release that alcohol after all is will help me get through the last two weeks. However, waking up with a desert-mouth and then seeing that one of my mates from University posted the song below on FB made yesterday tough. I miss you Faxe Kondi! Besides I don’t have much to report. I’ll keep you updated Cheers - but unfortunately in Coke and not Faxe K :’( /K
